gist.headline: Rolling for Initiative
gist.blurb: polli-dungeon joins the party! Your tabletop campaigns just got an AI dungeon master to spice up the narrative.
gist.summary: Added polli-dungeon to the Games showcase, an AI-powered tool for D&D encounter generation and NPC behavior.
gist.impact: Players and DMs can now access AI-driven narrative assistance for their tabletop sessions directly from the showcase.
gist.visual_concept: Dungeons & Dragons theme. Polly the Bee as a Dungeon Master wearing a wizard hat, rolling a d20 die. A map or tavern table setting.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing a tiny wizard hat, rolling a glowing lime green (#ecf874) twenty-sided die on a parchment map. Soft pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi tabletop RPG vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text: 'CRITICAL HIT'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
